remarks: An element covering a lattice plane is a lattice volume and vice-versa. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lplncvrlvol.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lplncvrlvol.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lplncvrlvol.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lplncvrlvol.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
lplncvrlvol $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> ( X e. P <-> Y e. V ) ) $.
